inn1.comm: full and swinging in to the pads, Dickwella moves forward and drives it firmly to mid-on where Rohit doesn't stop it cleanly and allows the single
massive swing of the bat! He wanted to crash this away but this swing in an beats the inside edge by a long way
better from Dilshan! He leans forward, allows the ball to come him and whips it through the gap at midwicket. Excellent shot
another one, but this one has gone past the stumps! Dilshan wanted to flay this through off and gets an inside edge past the stumps
full and swinging away from the batsman, this time Dilshan leaves it alone
he stretches out and crashes this wide delivery through cover for the third boundary in the over! he didn't time it too well, but it was in the gap and raced away
gentle loosener outside off, Dickwella comes forward and defends it solidly to cover
another solid defensive shot! He comes forward and pushes it to mid-off this time
he pushes it with soft hands to wide mid-off to pick up a single. Binny keeping the ball up around the off stump
swings it away from a length, the batsman opens the face and runs it down to third man
full and swinging in to the pads, the batsman whips it straight to midwicket

he dabs it to the left of midwicket and calls for a quick single, and Kedar makes his presence felt. Hits it direct at the striker's end but he juggled the ball a bit before that, allowing Dilshan to get in easily
on the pads, the batsman fails to get bat on that but picks up a leg bye to the right of the keeper
he comes forward and punches it on the up to wide mid-off for a single
gets this move away from the batsman, Dickwella dabs it to the right of backward point for a single
he comes forward and punches it back down the pitch to the bowler
stays back and whips the back of length delivery to deep backward square leg for a single
slower delivery now, the batsman adjusts late and defends it back down the pitch
length delivery, some shape on it too, the batsman defends
he tries to whip it from outside off to the leg side, but can only find the man at midwicket
he is sticking to good line outside off, no room there, Dilshan pushes it towards mid-on
spoke to soon! Binny bowls it full and wide, and Dilshan takes full too, crashing it over point with a mighty thwack
full and swinging on off, Dilshan wants to murder this too but probably tried too hard.. pushed to mid-off
throws the bat again but gets a thick outside edge to third man! Dilshan is in a hurry
short and wide delivery, Dilshan chops it so hard on the adjacent pitches that it bounces over the cover fielder. Lots of power on that one
hits the thigh pad with one that comes in, but that was heading down the leg side
he cuts it hard on the ground again and it lobs so high before reaching point that the batsmen had enough time to go for a single

Dickwella's gone! Superb catch at square leg by Rayudu. He made it look very easy. It was a slower delivery and Dickwella whipped it towards the leg side. It was in the air but it was dropping on the fielder and he had to dive forward to get underneath
sharp short ball from the bowler! But this pitch has got some bounce in it, it sails over the batsman and over the keeper
another bouncer, Chandimal ducks under it easily
he takes a forward step and defends the length delivery solidly down the pitch
short ball at 126 kph, well it's not going to scare Dilshan. He hammers it through square leg
corrects the length now, bowls it outside off and Dilshan defends it to point
teases the batsman with away swing and a wider line, Dilshan leaves it alone
beautiful timing! No big swing, no flashing blade. Just a punch down the ground and it races past mid-off
he comes forward and shoulders arms to the length delivery. Seems to have settled down a bit

Binny gets his man! That's the scrambled seam delivery and it's a touch slower too! All his deliveries have been swinging in but this one keeps coming in with the angle. Dilshan wanted to drive it through the on side but makes no contact. Straight through him, it skims the pads and it hits the middle
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and leaves it alone but it wasn't too far from the off stump
keeps it straight and on the stumps at 130 kph, the batsman pushes it to mid-on
marginally short and Chandimal goes for the pull, but doesn't get hold of it.. it rolls towards backward square leg
full and swinging, beats Mahela, who pushed away from the body and played outside the line
he comes behind the line solidly this time and defends it to cover
swinging away from a fuller length, Chandimal defends it tentatively
slower delivery again, the batsman wanted to drive through off but ends up pushing it to mid-on
goes wide of the crease and looks for that away swing, Chandimal defends it to short cover easily
length delivery on the off, the batsman pushes it to mid-on
angles it from wide of the crease, Chandimal pushes it to mid-on with soft hands
wants to crash it through the off side but doesn't get the timing, pushed to mid-off
appeal for lbw as Mahela misses his flick and is hit on the top of the front pad but that was always going down
takes a forward step and whips it through midwicket easily for a couple
slower delivery outside off, 110 kph, but Mahela is behind it solidly, defends it to cover
he wrists it to midwicket where Jadhav makes a partial stop but can't prevent a single
he leans forward and punches it back at the bowler
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it straight at short cover
keeps it tight outside off, Mahela defends it to point
goes wide of the crease and gets that outswing to land in the perfect place, it adds doubt and it flies past the outside edge
too straight this time, bread and butter for Mahela as he flicks it straight to fine leg

the slower ball almost does the damage again! It was full outside off and Chandimal went down on his knee to slog it over the leg side, but he only manages a top edge.. Luckily it just lands behind mid-on
better from the batsman, he comes forward and punches this one to mid-off
he wants to work it away to the leg side but the ball straightens, the batsman gets a leading edge towards point
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the leg side
not much backlift from Mahela but he is a touch player, lifts this one up and over wide mid-on for a two-bounce four
slower delivery on the stumps, Mahela caresses it through to deep midwicket with ease
length delivery outside off, Chandimal pushes it straight to cover
on the pads again, Chandimal clips it easily to deep backward square leg
slower delivery again, but this one is going down the leg side and Mahela tickles it to deep square leg
he comes forward and nudges the length ball to wide mid-on for a quick single
bouncer, well wide of off, Chandimal pulls it hard to the leg side but Rahane sticks his hand out at short midwicket to block it
loud appeal as he hit the back leg with an inswinger! But that was probably going over and down the leg side
Whoa! Chandimal gives it a charge and wants to send this to Colombo! But this swings away and beats the outside edge. Clear rush of blood from the batsman there. It's the 12th over.
slower and outside off, the batsman still looking to hit it too hard, chops it to point
smashes this fuller delivery down the ground, but Binny sticks his boot out and stops it. It was the best connection Chandimal made in this over. Harsh to call it a drop
drops it short and Mahela sends it soaring over midwicket. One bounce and four
some sharp turn now! And that too when it was flat and short. Mahela defends it off the back foot
slower and outside off, Mahela waits and pushes it to deep point
flatter and quicker on the stumps, Chandimal punches it to mid-on
beautifully bowled! Tosses it up outside off, draws the batsman out and gets it to turn to beat the outside edge
more flight, the batsman dabs it to the left of cover and thinks about a single, but drops the idea as he sees Virat charging towards the ball
tossed up outside off, the batsman steers it to the left of backward point for a quick single
turn for Ashwin too! Gets it to comes in sharply and hits the pads
he steps out and nudges it with the spin through square leg
tossed up outside off, Mahela plays for the turn but there isn't any, he gets a thick outside edge past the slip fielder and it runs down to the boundary
slower and straighter again, Mahela defends this one down the pitch
pushes it a bit wider and Mahela shapes for the cut, but this turns in sharply. The batsman adjusts and dabs it to backward point for a quick single
slower and loopy on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he goes down on his knee and sweeps it from outside off to deep backward square leg
massive turn! This is flatter, lands on the off stump line and turns away sharply past the batsman's defensive prod

Chandimal's patience runs out! He wants to slog sweep this out of the ground but can only manage a thick top edge. He was nowhere near the delivery there. Rohit backpedals at mid-on and settles under the skier
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
there is something on this pitch for the spinners, this one straightens from a length. Mahela waits on the back foot and defends
pushed through outside off, Angelo defends it to cover
he shuffles across and dabs this one to midwicket
goes deep in the crease and defends this flighted delivery to the leg side
shuffles across and leans forward to defend it to the leg side
some sharp turn from outside off, Angelo is surprised as he defends it to square leg, his bottom hand coming off the handle
completes a maiden with a quicker delivery on off, Angelo defends it down the pitch
Oh how beautiful is that! He leans forward, waits for the ball to do whatever it has to, then just carves it inside out over cover
this one is marginally short and Mahela creates space by going deep, pulls it through wide mid-on and it has enough legs to beat the fielder
tossed up on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
full and flighted on off, Mahela pushes it to cover
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
waits and wants to run it down fine on the off side, but can't beat short third man
gets it to turn away but that helps Angelo with some room as he cuts it to deep backward point
tossed up outside off, the batsman lets it go through
big turn from a length, the batsman pushes it to short cover
drifts this one in towards middle, Angelo defends it off the back foot
slower this time, Mathews looks to cut but finds the man at backward point
goes back in the crease and pushes this one to the leg side, but the midwicket fielder moves to his left and cuts off the chance of a single
tossed up outside off, Mahela pushes it calmly towards long-on for an easy single
he moves back in the crease and dabs this through square leg for a quick single

oh massive, vicious turn! Not much Mahela could have done there. It was a flatter one and Mahela opens up to play the cut shot, but this jags in sharply into the batsman and there is no getting away from it. It hits the batsman's gloves and flies to the slip fielder. Mahela could have adjusted but there was bounce there too. It hits the front pad first actually, then the bat.. then to Ajinkya
tossed up outside off and it turns away, left alone
flighted closer to the stumps this time, the batsman stretches forward and defends
loopy on the off stump, Thirimanne lunges forward and defends
pushed through on off stumps, the batsman defends it to mid-off
slower this time, Angelo comes forward and smothers the spin
pushed through on the stumps, Angelo keeps defending
he stretches out and paddles this one in a premeditated fashion for runs down to fine leg
some room outside off and Angelo wants to crash it through point, but it's not short enough. He gets a bottom edge to the off side
he leans forward and defends this back to the bowler
flatter and turning away, the batsman defends it off the back foot
full and flighted outside off, Thirimanne gets off the mark with a push down to long off
he reaches out to the flighted delivery and drives it firmly, but straight to mid-off
goes on the back foot and nudges it with the turn to deep backward square leg

outside edge! But just eludes Rahane at first slip. No second slip this time. The batsman pushed forward at a turning delivery and would have been a gonner if there was fielder there. This runs down to the boundary
flatter delivery, the batsman defends it off the back foot
slower and loopy outside off, the batsman defends it to cover
quicker one on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the back foot
quicker one again, Mathews clips it to square leg for a single
tossed up on off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
leans forward and pushes it towards cover
waits in the crease this time and bunts the flatter delivery on the pitch
is that a drop? Tossed up outside off, Angelo plays for the turn and there isn't any, Robin is not able to gather that. Not sure if there was an edge on that
now he goes well across the stumps and sweeps it from in front of the middle stump, dangerous shot but it bring him four
this one turns and stays low, the batsman had closed the bat face too early, gets a leading edge down the pitch
this one stays low too, but Angelo manages to clip it to deep square leg
pushed through outside off, left alone by the batsman
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman defends off the back foot
loopy delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to the leg side for a quick single
this one is definitely a drop! The batsman gets a thick outside edge and it flies to the right of Rahane at first slip. He gets one hand to it but cannot hold on. It hits him on the wrist
waits on the back foot and defends it
stays in the crease and works it away towards midwicket
he leans forward and defends this loopy delivery
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
tosses it up outside off, Thiri defends it to the leg side
bowls a low full toss that is driven down to long-on for an easy single
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman lunges forward in defence
he stretches out and pushes the flighted delivery to mid-off
flatter and turning away, the batsman gets a touch squared up as he defends to cover
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it to off
flatter and outside off, the batsman defends it towards point
pushed through on off, the batsman punches it to cover
tossed up delivery on off, pushed to cover
slower and loopy outside off, the batsman slices it towards point for a quick single
on the pads, Angelo waits and flicks it fine on the leg side for a couple of runs
he uses his feet and punches it down to long-on for a single
massive turn now! The batsman was pushing forward in defence but this beats the outside edge
too full this time, Angelo drives it down to long off for a single
loud appeal for lbw as he hits the front pad with a vicious turner that beat the inside edge! The impact was probably outside the line.. Would have hit the stumps definitely
he shuffles across and defends this turning delivery to the off side
uses his feet and takes it on the full, drives it down to long on
the topspinner now. Angelo waits on the back foot and defends it to the leg side
tossed up and slow, the batsman comes forward and defends
more loop from Rayudu but it's too full, the batsman works it away to deep square leg
on the pads, the batsman nudges it straight to backward square leg
down the leg side this time and Angelo paddles it fine! He makes some good connection there
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
on the leg side again, Angelo tickles it fine on the leg side again
another paddle! This time from Lahiru. He takes it from off stump, along with the turn and plays it fine enough for a couple
beautifully bowled! Loopy and it turns away past the outside edge
more flight, Angelo reaches out and defends it to off
too much flight this time, it's a low full toss and Angelo paddles it fine again. All the runs seem to be coming with one shot now
he lunges forward and defends the flighted delivery to the off side
turns outside off, the batsman leaves it alone. Robin is not able to collect it cleanly, gets up too early
bowls it slow on off stump, the batsman pushes it towards point
pushed through on off stump, Thiri stretches forward and defends
he watches this one carefully and lets it go as this is wide enough
quicker one on the off stump, the batsman defends it awkwardly to the leg side
he is a touch tentative in the crease as he defends this to the off side
quicker one on the pads, Thirimanne goes back and punches it through midwicket for three
another appeal for lbw as the batsman gets hit in front of the leg stump. That was the sharp turn that surprised the batsman. Would have probably kissed the leg stump
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman leans forward in defence
comes down the pitch but has to adjust as this turns in, gets an inside edge to the leg side
shorter and some room provided too, the batsman goes back and punches it through the gap  at cover
quicker and wider outside off, lots of room there and Thiri cashes in, crunching it through cover point for a welcome boundary
takes a step down the crease and drives it to long-on
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman defends it to off
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman dabs it towards point
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends it to point
much slower now, the batsman keeps defending
full and flighted, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket with a wristy shot
a full toss, the batsman misses out and he gets a bit of an inside edge towards deep square leg
flatter and spinning away, the batsman defends it to point off the back foot
goes deep in the crease, allows the ball to turn away, then punches it to deep cover
tossed up, the batsman uses his feet and pushes it to mid-on
tossed up on the stumps and this one spins past the outside edge
finally, he breaks the shackles with a firm hit over midwicket! It was a full toss and Mathews kills it over the infield
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman looks to defend but gets an inside edge to short fine leg
length delivery on off, Angelo stays on the back foot and defends it to cover
back of length, the batsman whips it to the leg side but finds the man at backward square leg
waits on the back foot and punches it straight past the bowler for a quick single to mid-off. Jadhav hits the stumps for the second time, but Mathews is in comfortably
slower delivery outside off, the batsman drives it firmly but straight to mid-off
he waits in the crease and opens the face of the bat late to run it down to third man
he stays back and whips the slower delivery past midwicket for a couple to the deep
tossed up on the stumps, driven to wide long on
flighted on the off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
pushes this one through a touch quicker, Angelo defends it to off
flatter on the stumps, the batsman defends
flatter outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it to cover
he waits on the back foot and flicks it to deep midwicket
bowls it from well behind the crease, Thiri clips it behind square on the leg side for a single
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends off the back foot
slower delivery from wide of the crease, the batsman defends it off the back foot
he dabs this one towards the point and is called for a quick single by a charging Thiri
bowls it from behind the crease again, the batsman comes forward and punches it to deep cover
he stays back and whips the length delivery to deep midwicket to bring up the team's 150. And it's time for drinks
slower and tossed up, turns past the outside edge
quicker on the stumps, Angelo leans forward and defends
slightly shorter, the batsman goes back and pushes it through cover for a single
quicker one outside off, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
Thick outside edge as this one turns in and bounces extra.. Thiri was looking for a cut, edges it to Robin's left pad
quicker one, this one turns in and hits the pads. Loud appeal for lbw but the impact was probably outside off
slow, short and wide outside off, Angelo misses out as he hits this hard but not far away from the fielder at cover, who gets a hand to it
quicker one drifting on the pads, the batsman flicks it through square leg for a single
flatter on the stumps, Angelo shuffles across and works it away behind square on the leg side
leans forward and punches it straight to mid-on
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the off side
he comes behind the line and pushes it to long off for a single
fuller on the off stump, Thiri leans forward and drives it to wide long on for a single
flatter and this turns away, beats the outside edge again
tossed up on the pads, the batsman dabs it to midwicket for a quick single
flatter outside off, Thiri wrists it to the left of mid-on for a quick single
tossed up on the stumps, Angelo nudges it to square leg for a single
comes down the pitch but has to defend as he is not close to the pitch of the delivery
superb hit! He moves a touch towards the leg side, creating some room and just times it over extra cover. Beautifully hit. Brings up his half-century, yet another one
he leans forward and defends the tossed up delivery
looks for the big hit but just falls over to the off a touch, gets an inside edge to short fine leg
goes down on the knee and paddles it fine on the leg side for a couple
steps out of the crease and pushes the tossed up delivery down to long on
shorter and on the pads, the batsman tucks it to the left of short fine leg
he comes round the wicket and pushes it through outside off, the batsman dabs it towards cover point for a single
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman drives it down to long-on
wonderful shot! Angelo knows there is no one behind point, so he chooses the reverse, flogs it over the fielder comfortably. He picked it up from outside leg stump
massive, massive! He steps down the pitch and hammers it over long-on. Kohli wondering why he brought in Rayudu. That is huge hit
another one! This one is in the slot outside off, Mathews takes his front leg out and kills it over long on. Second tier. Thank you. Century of the partnership comes as well
he waits in the crease and works it away to deep backward square leg
tossed up on the off, the batsman drives it down to long on
quicker delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman flicks it to deep midwicket
drifting on to the pads, the batsman looks to paddle it but finds short fine leg
he waits on the back foot and looks to cut it to deep point but Akshar cuts it off with a  dive. Still a single
short and quick, the batsman flicks it to short fine leg. Virat placed there.
now Thiri joins in the fun! Gets a tossed up delivery and he goes down on his knee to slog-sweep it into the grass banks. Massive hit again
pushed through on off, that stayed low and somehow Angelo keeps it out
he dabs it to the right of point fielder for a quick single
flatter and on the stumps, the batsman works it away to deep backward square leg
superb delivery! Quicker outside off, just gets enough turn to beat the outside edge. Angelo was looking to push it away from the body
beaten again! A repeat of the previous delivery
quicker one on the stumps, the batsman wants to nudge it in the gap on leg side but finds the man at midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, Thiri uses his feet and drives it to long on. Angelo drops his gloves on the pitch as he charges down
waits in the crease and works it away to deep midwicket
waits and plays it really late, almost from the off stump, picks up a single to short third man
he dabs it to point for another single. That brings his 1000 runs in ODIs this year. First batsman to do so in 2014
now Thiri gets to his half-century with a nudge through midwicket
quicker delivery on off, the batsman defends it to cover
quicker one on off, the batsman looks to push it down the ground but gets an inside edge to fine leg
bowls the carrom-ball, but Angelo spots it early, dabs it to point for another single
fuller and flighted, Thiri drives it down to long on
another carrom-ball, this time on the leg stump line, nudged to square leg for another single
he steps out but is not to the pitch of the delivery, defends
big hit! Not quite. He looks to launch it over long-on but can only find Rayudu. Simple catch there. An excellent 128-run stand comes to an end
on the pads, Angelo tucks it to square leg for a single
spins this one in to the batsman and hits the pads, but this was turning down the leg side
he almost takes Angelo down with this powerful hit! Steps out and slaps it down the ground
he is on a roll, clears his front leg out as soon as he sees the flight on this delivery and sends it over wide long-on. Huge hit
he has got better hold of this one! Gets under it and slogs it over midwicket for another six. Moves into the 90s

full and on the stumps, Mathews knows all the spots in the field by know, he goes down on his knee and sweeps it past short fine leg. Excellent stuff. He is toying with the bowling at the moment. Just one hit away from his maiden 100 now. Already his best
he bowls it down the leg side and Thisara smartly just gets a touch on it, it runs away to the boundary
this one stays a touch low and hits the toe of the bat as Thisara looks to push it to cover, but they take a single anyway
bowls full, Angelo pushes it to wide long-on with soft hands and calls for a second

low full toss on the pads, he is calling for the second to wide long-on! yes, he comes back for it. Angelo, what an innings, take a bow, his maiden century! 116 innings he has taken, but this had been a brilliant effort.
he comes down the pitch and what timing! It's low full toss and he just blocks it through the gap at cover, it races across the turf
slower delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to point for a quick single
he looks for the big sweep but misses.. for a moment it looks like he has swept it on the stumps, but it is off Robin's pads
now he is playing for fun! Clears his front leg and hammers it over long-on. Six sixes for him
no matter where it lands, he is going to go after everything. This is wide, not full, but Mathews tonks it over long-on again. Keep them coming
fuller and quicker, no room to get under, Mathews punches it down to long on

a high full toss brings a wicket! That could have been hit anywhere but Perera finds the fielder at deep backward square leg. It was a flat hit, a little here or a little there, it could have been a six.
woohoo Mathews! Flatter from over the wicket, doesn't make an iota of difference. Mathews whacks it over midwicket for another six. This ground is too small for him. He is doing it all alone
looks to sweep but makes no connection, it rolls off his pads to the leg side, not very far from the keeper
same shot again, not bat this time as well, but it rolls further towards short fine leg
wanted to whack it to the stands but this one turns in sharply, misses the inside edge, misses the leg stump, misses Robin (or rather Robin misses) and runs down to the boundary
now since this one hasn't turned, it has to go to the boundary. Mathews watches this carrom-ball and sends it over the cow corner again
this is madness! Six more. What he is on now! Ashwin goes round the wicket, but Mathews just times it over the umpire.. clears the ropes
now keeps the strike with a dab to short third man
goes wide outside off, but this is too far from the wide marker
full and wide outside off, he squeezes it out to deep cover but can only pick up a single
he wants to make some room but gets a surprise bouncer. Ducks under it
pushes this too wide of off, more extras
short delivery, the batsman goes for the pull, top-edges and is caught at deep backward square leg, Prasanna keeps running to the pavilion.
he swings and misses! This was in the slot but somehow he doesn't connect
that's a good yorker wide outside off, the batsman digs it out to cover
he looks to pull and gets a top edge! Karn Sharma takes an over-head one-hander running to his right from mid-off

inn2.comm: fuller delivery outside off, Rahane reaches out and pushes it to cover
length delivery outside off, Rahane watches it carefully and lets it go through
angles it in towards the off stump, Rahane stays back and defends it down the pitch
on the middle and leg line, Rahane is not looking in any hurry, nudges this to square leg
gets off the mark with a punch through cover! It was short of length and Rahane rose with it, punches it off the back foot
fuller delivery outside off but no swing for Mathews, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to short cover
gets some inward movement! Rohit was looking to play it to the off but gets cramped as it curves into him, fends it off to the leg side
gets it to shape the other way now, Rohit leaves it alone
drifting on to the pads and that's flicked nicely, but the batsman picks out the fielder at square leg
beats the bat as he stretches out to chase the length delivery! He pulls out the bat belatedly, after he is beaten
beautiful delivery! This one angles in and then straightens to beat the defensive prod, squares up the batsman.
supremely hit through the gap at cover point! It was short of length and Rohit gets up on his toes to just push it through the gap, lots of timing there and it races away
length delivery on off, Rahane comes forward and defends it solidly to mid-on
he comes forward and calmly defends the length delivery to midwicket
he is keeping it tight around off, the batsman gets behind the line and defends
oh hat's a grubber.. It pitches on length, comes in and doesn't get up more than six inches. Rahane can't do much about it. It hits the middle stump. Mathews can't do anything wrong today!
some width first up for Rayudu, allows him to get off the mark with a cut to deep backward point
he comes forward and defends the length delivery solidly to short cover
angled towards the stumps, Rohit looks to push it to the leg side but gets a leading edge back down the pitch
outside edge! Rohit closes the bat face to play it towards midwicket but that straightens and rolls along where third slip would have been
he plays with a straighter bat this time, pushes it to wide mid-off for a single
now Rayudu gets a touch squared up as he defends this length delivery to the off. He was looking to play it to the leg side but it straightened on him
too far down the leg side, tests Chandimal behind the stumps
fuller and on the off and middle line, Rayudu punches it with a straight bat to mid-on
short ball to end the over, Rayudu lets it pass over his left shoulder
teasing line outside off, Rohit pushes forward and defends it to point
fuller length delivery outside off, Rohit doesn't blink, defends it back to the bowler
Mattheeeeeeeewws!! he takes out the big wicket. That was a length ball, no where for the pull, but Rohit wanted to play a cross-batted shot, and missed. That hits the top of middle.
length delivery on off, Kohli defends it solidly
teasing line from wide of the crease, Kohli comes forward before letting it go
completes a maiden now as Kohli pushes this length delivery to mid-on
looks to pull this short delivery but gets a bottom edge down the leg side, Chandimal prevents it from running down
big inswing and Gamage appeals, but this was always going down
skiddy delivery outside off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
another short delivery, this time Rayudu gets behind it properly, whacks it to the deep backward square leg boundary. That was in the perfect height as well
comes forward to defend the length delivery tot he off side
looks to throw his bat at a slightly wide delivery but finds the man at point
he gets off the mark with a crashing square drive! He got right on top of that and that scoots to the boundary
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to the off side
stays a touch low again, but Kohli is right behind it, defends it to mid-on
he comes forward and meets the ball right under his eyes, defended to the off side
short delivery heading down the leg side, Kohli looks to pull but gets an under edge that is stopped by a diving Chandimal, the keeper
Oii.. Close shout for the batsman as he gets beaten by an inswinger! Rayudu was looking to drive that on the up, a bit too ambitiously perhaps, played outside the line
fuller delivery on off is punched firmly to mid-on
he stays in the crease and punches the back of length delivery towards the non-striker
it could be close as Dilshan hits the stumps at the striker's end. The batsman dabbed it to the off side, but Rayudu has made it in in time

loud appeal for lbw as the batsman comes forward to defend! It's probably because the ball has hit the pad before the bat - both of them were quite close together. Rayudu was also playing way outside the crease. Eranga is not impressed with that decision, but that looked like it would have gone over
length ball defended to mid-off, but Angelo fires a wild throw at the striker's end and gives away an overthrow. Angelo?
drifting on to the pads and Kohli easily flicks it down to fine leg
he waits on the back foot and punches the length delivery to mid-on, played with a perfectly straight bat
this time he presses forward and punches the fuller delivery straight back at the bowler
more solid defence from Kohli as he reaches out and pushes it to cover. He is standing outside his crease to counter any movement
some width this time, Kohli guides it down to third man
fuller delivery on off, Rayudu defends it towards point
he keeps his bat face open as he defends, the ball goes to point again as he comes behind this length delivery on off stump
he has been punching everything with a straight bat but finds the fielder again, at mid-off this time
this time he pushes it towards mid-off with soft hands and calls for a quick single. Angelo misfields.. (Angelo again? ).. and allows an extra run
he tries to flay this through cover but is completely beaten! That was an ambitious shot as he was looking to punch it on the up
superb timing! Stays in the crease, allows the ball to come to him, then just whips it through midwicket with a neat touch
stays back and opens the face to guide this down to third man
angles it in towards the off stump, Rayudu comes forward and defends
ooh, what a shot! Kohli moves one step down the pitch and just flicks it over wide mid-on. No big flourish of the bat but look at the fly to the boundary. That bottom-handed shot.. it's a trademark
back of length on off, Kohli wrists it to deep square leg for a single
now Rayudu steps out of the crease and unlike Kohli, goes straight down the ground. All along the turf, past the non-striker. Superb shot
steps out again, gets a shortish delivery that is hammered through midwicket with a cross-batted shot
back of length delivery on the stumps, Rayudu drops it towards midwicket and calls fora  quick single
too straight from Angelo, Kohli works it away to deep midwicket easily for a single
he guides the length delivery down to third-man for an easy single
bouncer now. Rayudu looks like he is swaying out of line, but then attempts the upper cut. It's too late though as the ball has already gone past
on the pads, this is clipped to fine leg easily
bowls the slower bouncer but it takes off too much, easily over the head of the batsman
excellent timing! Kohli comes to the front foot and just pushes it to cover, and once it has passed the fielder, there is no stopping it. There was a man at deep cover, but is not able to cut it off
length delivery on the stumps, defended to mid-od
keeps it tight around off stump, Kohli comes forward and defends
good teasing flight from the bowler, Rayudu drives it to long-off but the ball was in the air briefly as it passed the bowler
nice loop again, Kohli pushes it to point with the turn
loopy delivery on the middle stump line, Kohli drives it down to long on for a single
that's a close one! Rayudu plays for the legspin but there isn't any. Oh the inside edge saves Rayudu there
he waits on the back foot and defends this one to the off side
big turn! It pitches outside leg stump and zips past outside off.. Rayudu keeps searching for it and gets beaten
back of length delivery outside off, Kohli punches it to deep cover for a single
full and wide outside off, the batsman drives it firmly to deep cover
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly
he has bisected the two fielders in the deep perfectly. It was on the pads and he flicks it expertly between fine leg and deep square leg
now he comes forward and punches it on the up to deep cover
he was looking to cut it through point but gets cramped for room with the inward movement, chops it to point
he comes forward and drives the loopy delivery past the bowler down to long off
another tossed up delivery, Rayudu uses his feet and drives it down to long off
another tossed up delivery but Kohli plays it to long on now
he lunges forward and defends the tossed up delivery solidly down the pitch
short and turning away, the batsman wanted to punch it to cover but his timing gets messed up as it stays low
he stretches forward and defends the flighted delivery to the leg side
bowls a slower delivery with a grunt, but it's well down the leg side
bowls length on off stump, Kohli dabs it to midwicket for an easy single
back of length on the stumps, Rayudu comes forward and whips it away to deep midwicket
slower delivery, it's spotted early and Kohli swats it to deep square leg
he tried to play the upper cut earlier but this time he gets it right as Thisara attempts a bouncer. But he probably got too much bat on that and slowed it down rather than guide it to the boundary
back of length on off, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
another slower delivery attempted, but it lands short and sits up, Rayudu has all the time to swing it over midwicket for a boundary
fuller outside off, Kohli drives but can't beat Dilshan at cover
pushes this one wide, the batsman pushes it to deep cover
tossed up on the stumps, calmly driven down to long off
too full and too wide, Kohli gets enough on that too place it anywhere he wants to.. he slices it through point as finds the boundary
fuller delivery on the stumps, eased to long on easily
bowls this one from the back of a hand, Rayudu defends it to backward square leg
flatter delivery on off, the batsman punches it to wide long on off the back foot
tossed up on the stumps, Rayudu punches it back to the bowler
slightly short from Dilshan, allows the batsman to rock back and push it towards deep cover
he leans forward, dabs it to short third man and scampers across to complete the single
another single, the batsman pushes it to mid-off, who is standing right at the edge of the circle
he punches it towards midwicket, who dives and parries it to mid-off, allows a single
he presses forward and defends the tossed up delivery towards cover
his line is slightly towards middle stump and that allows Kohli to drive it comfortably to long on
loopy delivery on the middle stump, eased to long on
that's the trademark Kohli drive! Tossed up on off, then Kohli uses that wristy cover drive that he plays against spinners, no chance for the fielder in the deep and he brings up his half-century..
goes on the back foot and works it away past the midwicket fielder for a single
full and flighted, the batsman reaches out and defends it down the pitch
he comes forward and drives the flighted delivery to deep midwicket
he steps out and looks to drive the flighted delivery through cover, but Thiri dives and keeps them to a single
he goes back and whips it away to the right of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
stays in the crease and punches it straight to deep midwicket this time
that fielder at midwicket is again in business as Rayudu drives it to him with the spin
nicely tossed up from Dilshan, Kohli gets it off the outside half of the bat as he defends it to off
tossed up on off stump, the batsman pushes it back at the bowler
he delivers the long hop and even though it stays low, it's short enough for Rayudu to kill it over midwicket, in the gap and through to the boundary
excellent delivery! Tossed up, grips the surface, turns and bounces away. Rayudu lets it go through and Mahela takes it at slip
he uses his feet and pushes it to midwicket
he leaves this one alone, but that one didn't turn, wasn't very far from off stump
he wanted to come out of the crease, then went back, and gets beaten in the end as he looks to cut
bowls the legspinner that he has been trying in this innings but it is down the leg side
tossed up on the middle stump, Kohli drives but can't beat midwicket
some turn for Dilshan, but Kohli defends it comfortably off the front foot
goes back in the crease and whips it with the turn down to deep backward square leg
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman shaped for the sweep but changed it to a push down the pitch
tossed up and this turns down the leg side
bowls it slower this time, the batsman has to wait before defending it down the pitch
superbly bowled, but equally well-played. It was tossed up on off, it turned away and Kohli waits for an extra second to run it down past the slip fielder
he reaches out and drives the tossed up delivery to deep cover
superbly hit! He steps out of the crease and drives it all along the ground through extra cover. Gamage should have stopped it but doesn't bend down in time
gets it to turn from the leg stump line, the batsman dabs it towards cover and calls for a quick single
loopy delivery on off, the batsman leans forward and pushes it to deep cover
tossed up on the middle stump line, the batman pushes it straight to Dilshan at cover
tries the lespinner again but bowls it down the leg side, the batsman thumps it down to fine leg for a single
another legbreak, another one on the pads, the batsman tickles it to backward square leg easily
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman drives it firmly but straight to cover
goes back and nudges it with the turn to square leg for a single
he knew the mid-off was up, so steps out and lofts it over the infield. Good timing there as it lands just short of the ropes
better length from Dilshan, the batsman defends it down the pitch
good lines from Prasanna, pitches on middle and turns away. Kohli defends off the back foot
he reaches out to the flighted delivery and pushes it to cover
slower and loopy on off, Kohli plays the whippy drive again but Mathews has placed his deep cover a touch straighter now
gets this one to drift in to the batsman, Rayudu defends it down the pitch
uses his feet and gets to the pitch of the delivery, drives it to long off
flighted and too full, Kohli drives it to deep cover again for a single
back of length delivery outside off, Kohli chops it to third man but a fumble allows an extra run
bowls it too straight, Kohli doesn't try anything extravagant, just nudges it fine easily to beat the long leg fielder
fuller delivery outside off, Kohli calmly leans forward and drives it to deep cover
he looks to punch this length delivery through off but chops it near the pitch as this one comes in to him
superbly hit! This is the finest steer. If there was a slip, it would still have been between the keeper and the slip fielder. Calmly guides it to reach his half-century
now leans forward and defends the length delivery down the pitch
big turn for Dilshan! It pitches on off and darts away down the leg side. Umpire thinks it's fine
he stays back and punches it with the turn to square leg
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he goes back and punches it it wide mid-off for a single
he waits on the back foot and defends the quicker delivery
it was almost a good over but Rayudu ruins it with a nonchalant sweep that looks like going over the infield but it actually goes all the way over midwicket. Superb timing there
length delivery outside off, Kohli guides it down to third man for a single
angled delivery from wide of the crease, the batsman defends it to cover
he charges down the pitch, gives himself some room as well, then punches it through the gap at cover for a single to the deep
looks to pull it from outside off but misses, this was a slower bouncer. Got an edge on it as well but it just drops short of the keeper
he whips it off his hips to deep midwicket but a fumble there allows a second run

the partnership is broken! Big big hesitation between the two batsmen. Kohli looks to chop it to third man but plays it too fine, it's cut-off by the diving keeper. Rayudu has meanwhile run down the length of the pitch. Kohli was ball watching. He didn't move. Then Rayudu had to be sent back and be the sacrificial lamb. .He charges, comes all the way down to the other side but no way he was going to survive this. Eranga had all the time in the world to throw down the stumps.
he goes back to defend this to the leg side, it stayed low but he manages to play it to midwicket
another one stays low, the batsman defends it down the pitch towards mid-on
third one in a row that stays low, the batsman defends again
he stays back and pushes it towards midwicket
he gets a bit of top edge as he goes for the sweep, it was only going to be a single but Dickwella slips near the boundary and gives away four
he stands tall and defends the back of length delivery towards point
that's a steer to third-man, but that is played so well, it's fine, very fine and it beats the third-man fielder easily
this time he shuffles across and pushes it to wide mid-on for a single
he stays rock solid in defence as he plays this length ball down the pitch
shortish delivery on the stumps, the batsman pulls it down to deep square leg in a controlled fashion
Uthappa plays another fine steer but this time it is cut off by third man
pushes this one through but this is well down the leg side
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it down to long on
spinning down the leg side and Kohli just clips it fine for another couple of runs
he stays on the back foot and defends the quicker delivery
he stays back and plays it fine leg with the turn
tossed up delivery on the stumps, Uthappa defends it down the pitch
heading down the leg side and Uthappa just scoops it fine to help it on its way to another boundary
back of length delivery on the stumps, Kohli chops it down to third man, which brings 1000 runs for him this year
length ball on off, Uthappa defends it to the off side
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery back to the bowler
fuller delivery and Uthappa drives it in the air towards mid-off
he waits on the back foot and whips this length delivery from off stump to wide mid-on for a couple
he looks to run this fine on the off side again but misses it completely this time
that is excellent delivery! He bowled it slower, tossed it up, pitched on leg stump and turned it past the outside edge as Kohli pressed forward
he pushes forward again and picks up a single with a dab to mid on
massive turn again! It pitches well outside leg stump and turns to hit the batsman on the chest as he goes down to play the sweep
he waits on the back foot and punches it to deep point for a couple
he pushes forward and smothers the spin down the pitch
too full this time, allows the batsman to drive it to deep cover
flatter and on the pads, the batsman whips it to deep square leg and another fumble in the deep allows the second run
he leans forward and defends the quicker delivery to the off side

Angiiiiiieeee! He is back. He dives full length at midwicket to pluck this inches off the ground! Uthappa whipped the tossed up delivery towards the leg side and was looking for a single to the  deep but he failed to keep it down. Mathews is back again. He dives full length to his right and gets his hand underneath
he steps out straightaway and punches the flighted delivery to long on
fuller delivery on the middle, Kohli eases it down to long on
flatter and shorter, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover off the front foot
he pings that tiny gap at backward point! The ball was only a touch short and it spun away to give the batsman room. Kohli waited and cut it expertly
quicker on the off stump, he defends it off the back foot
slower delivery on the stumps, Kohli defends it solidly
here comes his whippy drive, but it's straight to deep cover for a single
tosses it up but this is a full toss down the leg side, Jadhav flicks it to deep backward square leg for a single. And it's time for drinks
yorks the batsman this time, Jadhav manages to dig it out
he steps out a touch too early and pushes outside the line, gets hit on the pads
goes down on his knee for the sweep and places it in the gap at deep backward square leg
too short from Mendis! Jadhav is known for his big hitting, but not for late-cut. Here he waits and waits and almost plays it off the keeper's gloves.. runs it down fine
tossed up delivery, he plays outside the line and gets an inside edge towards the leg side. Kohli wants strike but Jadhav wasn't moving
still cannot get it away, it skims off his pad down to short fine leg
tossed up delivery, Kohli pushes it softly towards wide mid-on and picks up a single
he is no hurry, defends the fuller delivery back down the pitch
big spin for the bowler! Jadhav wanted to cut it, but pulled his bat in
he steps out but yorks himself, digs it out to mid-on
uses his feet again and whips this one to square leg for a single
tossed up but this is too wide and full! The keeper is not able to stop it and it bounces over his right shoulder, Mahela is not able to react to it and it runs down to the boundary
he gets a low full toss and Jadhav sweeps it through backward square leg into the boundary
shorter this time on the middle stump, but it gave Jadhav enough time to create room and slap through cover point for another boundary
poor delivery again! A long hop and Jadhav misses out as he pulls this one straight to deep midwicket
loopy delivery on the stumps, Kohli leans forward and calmly picks up a single to deep midwicket
too full to cut! Jadhav was looking at the gap at point but makes no connection
tossed up outside off, the batsman looks to defend but gets an outside edge to point
full and flighted on the middle stump, Kohli is in no hurry, pushes it back to the bowler
he opens the face of the bat this time to drive it to deep cover for a single
good teasing delivery outside off, it turns away and Jadhav leaves it alone
goes on the back foot to this turning one, defends it to the leg side
takes a step out of the crease and wants to flick this one to the leg side but gets hit on the pads
tosses it up but this is too far outside off, called a wide
looks to cut it but can't beat the man at backward point
tossed up on off, the batsman defends it towards short third man
bowls the topspinner outside off, Kohli crashes it off the back foot to deep cover
bowls a good googly and the batsman didn't spot it, luckily for him, he gets an inside edge that runs fine on the leg side

oh he is gone! Jadhav has wasted his chance. He stepped out of the crease and was looking to hammer it over midwicket but left a little gap between the bat and pad. The ball sneaks through and hits the off stump
bowls the topspinner that is punched to deep cover off the back foot
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
the batsman steps out and pushes it to midwicket
quicker delivery on off stump, stays a touch low but Binny defends it off the back foot
poor line, this is heading down the leg side and Binny sweeps it fine to beat the fielder at long leg
slower this time, Dilshan tosses it up outside off and Binny defends
he steps out of the crease and pushes it towards mid-on
pushed through on the pads, easily clipped to deep backward square leg for a single
nice loopy delivery outside off, turns away, the batsman pushes it to point off the front foot
he steps out, takes it on the full and drives it firmly to mid-off
he looks to drive this fuller delivery but gets a thick outside edge past the slip fielder and it runs down to the boundary
he wanted to come down the pitch, then decided to stay back as the length was short, cuts, but finds the man at point
dabs this one towards point and calls for a quick single
tossed up on the stumps, Kohli eases it to long on and keeps the strike
that was close for Kohli! He gets an inside edge and is lucky that hits his pads and doesn't go towards the stumps.. Kohli doesn't know where it is.. it rolls past off stump and down to the keeper
on the pads, easy pickings for the batsman as he flicks it to deep backward square leg to move to 99

he gets this with a calm dab down to third-man! it's his 21st century in the 21st century. Unbelievable run machine this guy. He keeps them coming. He calmly takes his helmet off, it's a routine for him. His fourth ton this year
length delivery on the stumps, defended to cover
short outside off, the batsman cuts it down to third man for a single
comes behind the line of this delivery and defends it solidly to the off side

Mendis takes out Binny and Kohli cannot believe it! Binny steps out to the tossed up delivery, but this is a googly and it sneaks in between the bat and the pad, easy work for Chandimal behind the stumps

that's two in two! The building is crumbling. It was a harmlessly tossed up delivery but it was straight and Ashwin played down the wrong line. He was hit right in front of the middle and that looks out straightaway. But wait a minute? They are checking for the no-ball and it looks very very tight. It should be fine actually, some part is behind the line
he comes forward and defends this one solidly down the pitch
he waits on the back foot and steers it through backward point to get off the mark
nicely bowled! tossed up and just outside off, Kohli lashes at it and cuts it straight to point
quicker delivery on the pads, easily nudged to square leg for a single
tossed up outside off, Kohli thrashes it to deep cover but it's still a single
poor poor delivery! It's short and it's wide, Akshar waits on the back foot and crashes it through point
looks for the big drive at this fuller delivery but gets an inside edge to midwicket
looks to sweep from outside off and gets hit on the pads, extended appeal from the bowler but that was sliding away from off stump
he comes forward and can only push this back at the bowler
full and outside off, the batsman drives it over the infield without much timing but gets enough for a couple
tossed up on the pads, Kohli drives it firmly to long-on and it's still a single
shorter from the bowler, the batsman drags it down to backward square leg for a single

big hit! Big biggiee big! The batsman comes down the pitch, he is not too close to the ball but goes ahead anyway and launches it over the extra cover boundary. Massive hit, both in length and context
he comes down the pitch and hammers it down the ground, it's between Mendis' legs but there was no way he could have stopped that. That was slapped back. It runs down to the boundary
he bowls the middle stump yorker and Kohli can only dig it out down the pitch, almost a Malinga delivery but at half the pace
he wrists it away from outside off to deep midwicket to keep the strike
full and wide outside off, very wide. This is the delivery that Malinga delivered with precision in that WT20 final
wider still, Kohli stretches out and punches it to deep cover for a single
he gets the outside edge but this runs down to the boundary! Akshar played inside the line of that - an offcutter - but the third man was in the circle
almost a catch by the bowler! Akshar pushes it back and it wasn't too far from the bowler's right hand but he was going in the other direction in his follow through

oh superb! This is very wide outside off and Kohli has to really stretch to reach it, but he manages that and then scoops it over extra cover .. beats the man running from deep cover and finds the boundary
length delivery outside off, he gets the single he wanted with a dab to third man. Walks it
on the pads, Akshar takes a single with a flicks to short fine leg
tight lines around the middle stump, the batsman pushes it to mid-on and picks up a single to bring Kohli to strike
shortish delivery, Kohli steps out and flat-bats it to wide long on to pick up a couple. Good work by Prasanna in the deep to cut off the boundary
pushes this one to deep cover for a single
just marginally short and Akshar plays a short-arm jab towards midwicket for another single
he comes down the pitch, gets a slower ball, drags it to deep backward square leg and scampers for the second run. Completes it easily
length delivery outside off, he crashes it to deep backward point for a single
this is Dhoni-like shot! It is the helicopter. It was full, there was not much room , but Kohli stays back and gets under it to smash it over long on
picks up a single to short third man with a late cut
he dabs it to the leg side and looks towards Kohli who was charging down, another tight single taken
game over! He steps down the pitch and smashes it over long on. Lets out a roar
